summary: This is an email from February 26, 2021, regarding the preparation of a cite-checked omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's motions. The email discusses proofreading, discovery, and redactions before filing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal motions being opposed in the memorandum of law.

events.title: Preparation of Opposition to Maxwell's Motions
events.description: Legal team works on finalizing a cite-checked omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's motions, including proofreading, discovery, and redactions.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 26, 2021, concerning legal proceedings against Ghislaine Maxwell.
It references an attached 'omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Maxwell's motions'.
The legal team planned to proofread, handle discovery references, and manage redactions before filing the document.
